group_1.narration: [textBlack:＜After learning that Rika and Ren]@[textBlack:were driving away the Cowards' Hearts]@[textBlack:in order to cheer up everyone in time]@[textBlack:for Christmas, Emiri and Akira told them]@[textBlack:that they wanted to help out, too.＞]

group_1.textRight: We were like, JUST talking about that@same thing!
This year’s Christmas spirit wasn’t shining@very bright, you know?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...
Everyone who visits the mall looks glum,@and there aren't any special events...
I’ve been wanting to do something about it.

group_1.textRight: Thank you! That’d be super helpful!
But...

group_1.textLeft: Huh? What's up?

group_1.textRight: Ah...we...
Mitama...shared her magic with us...yes...

group_1.textLeft: You’re not using your powers as a Magical@Girl?
Only Master’s powers will work.
Otherwise, the Cowards' Hearts can’t be@driven away, chun.

group_1.textRight: Seriously?!
So there's like, nothing we can do?

group_1.textLeft: Not much, chun!
I’d like for you two to go out separately@and search for the Cowards' Hearts.

group_1.textRight: The Cowards' Hearts... Is that the thing@that came out of me earlier?

group_1.textLeft: Cheep!
I look for the Hearts, and Rika and Ren@drive them out with their magic.
You two can split up and help us track@down the other Hearts I've sensed.
I want you to inform Rika and Ren if you@find any, chun.

group_1.textRight: Okie-dokie-artichokie!!
Leave it to me! I’m pretty good at playing@hide and seek!

group_1.textLeft: I don’t think this and that are the same@thing...
I’m glad...you two will help us...

group_1.textRight: Yeah...[chara:350101:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:350101:cheek_0][chara:350101:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:350101:lipSynch_1]Honestly, I didn't think we could get rid of@seven more Cowards' Hearts today by ourselves.
I was pretty worried...
...Well, we’ve got work to do, so let’s get@going!

group_1.narration: ―Emiri―@Ah! Hey, hey,@why don’t we make the four of us a team?
―Emiri―@In a situation like this,@we have to have some special name!
―Rika―@I mean, we’re all working@so hard for Christmas...

group_1.textLeft: Alright, how about we use your magic to@fix up this place in one shot!

group_1.textRight: Ah...what do you mean by that...?

group_1.textLeft: If you get the town all decorated for@Christmas...
Everyone will get into the holiday spirit,@and it’ll brighten everyone’s hearts!
How about it?@Not bad, right?!
Yeah, people who see the decorations as@they walk by might cheer up.

group_1.textRight: Well, if that’s the case,@let’s give it a shot!
You good with that, Ren?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...
I think...we should make the mall...@ready for Christmas...
[chara:350102:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh!?

…………[chara:300850:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:300850:lipSynch_1]...Are those the...Christmas decorations?@[chara:300850:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:300850:cheek_0][chara:300850:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:300850:lipSynch_1]It’s...not what I was expecting.

group_1.textRight: Huh?
It’s got a Christmas party-ish feel to it,@so I think we’re all set!
What the–?
I was hoping for something more romantic!

group_1.textLeft: S-sorry, Rika...@I...got distracted...
Oh, I see! I see!
I just noticed you’ve got a little eyelash@on your cheek.

group_1.textRight: That’s...th-thank you...yes...

group_1.textCenter: We can't wait around here all day! We just@recruited more team members, after all!
We have to hurry up and find the next@Coward's Heart, chun!

group_1.textRight: Yeah…!
